hero.title: Benchmarking agents on Enso Shortcuts
hero.subtitle: Weekly snapshots of how automation stacks plan and execute Enso routes and bundles across chains. Coverage rewards breadth, while Operation Needle checks if intents survive long-context noise.

pillars.title: Coverage
pillars.text: Unique action signatures across DEX, lending, yield, bridge, and derivative domains with composition bonuses for atomic bundles.

pillars.title: Intent quality
pillars.text: Intent score tracks how efficiently an agent strings together multi-step bundles using Enso’s routing metadata.

pillars.title: Operation Needle
pillars.text: Long-context prompts hiding a single high-priority instruction; success demands correct calldata and fork execution.

howto.title: Update the snapshot
steps: Drop fresh run outputs under runs/<timestamp> (per_tx.jsonl, eval_per_tx.jsonl, eval_score.json, optional eval_needle.json).
Append coverage + needle results into runs/bench_scores.jsonl, then regenerate data/models.json (script recommended).
Copy supporting artifacts into data/samples/<track>/<run_id> so the explorer can render them.
Deploy frontend/enso-bench-site to GitHub Pages, Vercel, or any static host.
howto.footnote: Scores on this page were captured from EnsoBench runs recorded 2025-01-31.

home.footer: EnsoBench — Intent-native coverage and Operation Needle validation

trajectories.title: Intent Explorer
trajectories.subtitle: Pick a leaderboard run or upload your own artifacts to inspect Enso action signatures, domains, and bonuses per intent.

uploader.note: Required files: eval_per_tx.jsonl, per_tx.jsonl (optional: eval_score.json, eval_needle.json)

errors.missing_files: The selected folder is missing eval_per_tx.jsonl or per_tx.jsonl.

needle.title: Operation Needle
needle.subtitle: Needle-in-haystack prompts validate that an agent can extract the single actionable instruction and return correct Enso calldata.

coverage.label: Coverage dataset
coverage.description: Scenario definitions for coverage scoring (domains, weights, per-tx action caps).

needle.label: Needle dataset
needle.description: Long-context Operation Needle prompts with paired ground_truth.json validators.

notes.title: Observations
items: Agents that reuse response.tx.to from Enso’s API avoid execution mismatches on delegate bundles.
Needle verdicts degrade quickly when slippage or layer-zero bridge parameters are hallucinated—watch the validator logs.
Coverage gains flatten once an agent repeats the same protocol combos; diversify domains for higher unique action counts.
